items.summary: Arguably the most obscure of Jewish customs, during Sukkot, Jews shake a closed date frond, some myrtle boughs, a few willow twigs and a citron fruit as part of the daily prayer service â€“ but why and where did this begin?

items.title: LLMs Vs. Geolocation: GPT-5 Performs Worse Than Other AI Models
items.summary: In June, Bellingcat ran 500 geolocation tests, comparing LLMs from various companies against each other, as well as Google Lens – a staple tool for finding the location of photos. At the time, ChatGPT o4-mini-high emerged as the clear winner, with Google Lens outperforming most other models. J
